text: Leposoma sinepollex is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposoma Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2013 Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Mauro Teixeira Jr. Category:Taxa named by Renato Recoder Category:Taxa named by Francisco Dal Vechio Category:Taxa named by Roberta Damasceno Category:Taxa named by Kátia Cristina Machado Pellegrino
title: Leposoma sinepollex
